titles.title: A resolution to designate both the month of August 1993 and the month of August 1994 as "National Slovak American Heritage Month".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8527-8528)
Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Designates August 1993 and August 1994 as National Slovak American Heritage Month.
